Headline: #75 74th-75th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problems at 95th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problems at 95th.

Shuttles buses are available from 95th to 63rd to provide connecting service through the affected area,

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
